issue.title: [Rust] Re-enable transform module tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12400](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12400). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The tests in the root of the array/transform module are currently commented out, this appears to have been done as part of moving from Arc<ArrayData> to ArrayData.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12400?focusedCommentId=17322442) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10048
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10048>
